all_symptoms: sneezing runny nose sore throat cough
description: A viral infection of your nose and throat.
prevention: Wash hands regularly, avoid close contact with sick individuals.

all_symptoms: fever chills muscle aches fatigue headache
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses.
prevention: Annual flu vaccination, good hygiene practices.

all_symptoms: severe headache nausea sensitivity to light sensitivity to sound
description: A neurological condition often accompanied by intense headaches.
treatment: Pain relievers, anti-nausea drugs, rest in a dark room.
prevention: Identify and avoid triggers, manage stress, stay hydrated.

all_symptoms: frequent urination increased thirst fatigue unexplained weight loss
description: A chronic condition that affects how the body processes blood sugar.
treatment: Diet changes, insulin therapy, oral medications.
prevention: Maintain a healthy weight, exercise regularly, eat a balanced diet.

all_symptoms: high blood pressure headache shortness of breath chest pain
description: A condition characterized by persistently high blood pressure.
prevention: Eat a low-sodium diet, exercise, manage stress.

all_symptoms: shortness of breath wheezing chest tightness cough
description: A condition in which your airways narrow and swell, causing breathing difficulty.
prevention: Avoid allergens, use preventive inhalers, manage stress.

all_symptoms: cough with phlegm fever chest pain shortness of breath
description: An infection that inflames the air sacs in the lungs.
prevention: Vaccination, avoid smoking, maintain good hygiene.

all_symptoms: persistent cough mucus production fatigue shortness of breath
description: Inflammation of the bronchial tubes in the lungs.
prevention: Avoid smoking, wear masks in polluted environments.

all_symptoms: persistent cough fever night sweats weight loss
description: A serious infectious disease that mainly affects the lungs.
prevention: Vaccination, early detection, avoid crowded areas.

all_symptoms: fever chills sweating nausea vomiting
description: A life-threatening disease caused by parasites transmitted through mosquito bites.
prevention: Use mosquito nets, insect repellents, take preventive antimalarials.

all_symptoms: fever severe headache joint pain rash
description: A mosquito-borne viral infection causing flu-like symptoms.
prevention: Avoid mosquito bites, eliminate standing water.

all_symptoms: high fever abdominal pain constipation diarrhea
description: A bacterial infection caused by contaminated food or water.
prevention: Vaccination, eat safe food and water.

all_symptoms: diarrhea vomiting abdominal cramps dehydration
description: Inflammation of the stomach and intestines, often caused by infection.
prevention: Practice good hygiene, avoid contaminated food and water.

all_symptoms: stomach pain nausea vomiting bloating
description: Sores on the lining of the stomach or upper small intestine.
treatment: Antacids, antibiotics (if caused by H. pylori).
prevention: Avoid NSAIDs, limit alcohol, reduce stress.

all_symptoms: severe pain blood in urine nausea frequent urination
description: Hard deposits made of minerals and salts inside the kidneys.
treatment: Pain relievers, hydration, surgery (if large stones).
prevention: Drink plenty of water, reduce salt intake.

all_symptoms: fatigue weakness pale skin shortness of breath
description: A condition in which there is a lack of healthy red blood cells.
prevention: Eat iron-rich foods, manage underlying conditions.

all_symptoms: fever cough shortness of breath loss of taste or smell
description: A respiratory illness caused by the coronavirus.
prevention: Vaccination, mask-wearing, social distancing.

all_symptoms: sneezing runny nose itchy eyes nasal congestion
description: An allergic reaction causing nasal congestion and sneezing.
prevention: Avoid allergens, use air purifiers.

all_symptoms: persistent sadness loss of interest fatigue sleep disturbances
description: A mood disorder causing persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest.
prevention: Manage stress, stay socially connected.

all_symptoms: joint pain stiffness swelling reduced joint mobility
description: Inflammation of one or more joints, causing pain and stiffness.
treatment: Pain relievers, physical therapy, anti-inflammatory drugs.
prevention: Maintain a healthy weight, exercise regularly.

all_symptoms: memory loss confusion difficulty thinking behavior changes
description: A progressive neurological disorder that causes memory loss and cognitive decline.
treatment: Medications to slow progression, cognitive therapies.
prevention: Stay mentally active, maintain a healthy diet, exercise regularly.

all_symptoms: tremors stiffness slow movement balance problems
description: A nervous system disorder affecting movement and coordination.
treatment: Medications, physical therapy, surgery in severe cases.
prevention: Healthy lifestyle, avoiding exposure to toxins.

all_symptoms: itchy skin redness dry skin skin inflammation
description: A chronic skin condition causing inflammation and irritation.
prevention: Avoid triggers, maintain skin hydration.

all_symptoms: red patches of skin scaling itching joint pain
description: A skin condition where skin cells build up, forming scales and itchy, dry patches.
prevention: Avoid triggers, manage stress, maintain skin care.

all_symptoms: jaundice fatigue nausea abdominal pain
description: A viral infection affecting the liver.
prevention: Vaccination, avoid sharing needles, safe sex practices.

all_symptoms: fatigue loss of appetite dark urine jaundice
description: A liver disease caused by the hepatitis C virus.
prevention: Avoid sharing needles, safe sex practices.

all_symptoms: diarrhea bloating weight loss abdominal pain
description: An immune reaction to eating gluten, damaging the small intestine.
prevention: There is no known prevention, but early diagnosis helps manage symptoms.

all_symptoms: seizures temporary confusion staring spells unconsciousness
description: A neurological disorder marked by recurring seizures.
treatment: Antiepileptic drugs, surgery in some cases.
prevention: Prevent head injuries, manage infections, and avoid triggers.

all_symptoms: chronic cough shortness of breath wheezing chest tightness
description: A group of lung diseases causing breathing difficulty.
prevention: Avoid smoking, reduce exposure to pollutants.

all_symptoms: joint pain fatigue skin rash fever
description: An autoimmune disease where the immune system attacks healthy tissue.
prevention: Avoid known triggers, manage stress.

all_symptoms: abdominal pain bloating diarrhea constipation
description: A digestive disorder causing abdominal discomfort and irregular bowel habits.
prevention: Identify and avoid trigger foods, maintain a balanced diet.

all_symptoms: fatigue weight changes hair loss cold or heat intolerance
description: Conditions affecting the thyroid gland, such as hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism.
treatment: Thyroid hormone replacement, medications to regulate hormones.
prevention: Maintain a balanced iodine intake, regular health check-ups.

all_symptoms: bone fractures loss of height back pain weak bones
description: A condition where bones become weak and brittle.
treatment: Calcium and vitamin D supplements, bone-strengthening medications.
prevention: Eat a calcium-rich diet, exercise regularly, avoid smoking.

all_symptoms: pelvic pain painful periods infertility heavy bleeding
description: A disorder in which tissue similar to the uterus lining grows outside it.
prevention: Early diagnosis and management.

all_symptoms: rash fever fatigue joint pain
description: A bacterial infection transmitted by tick bites.
prevention: Avoid tick-infested areas, use insect repellent.

all_symptoms: joint pain swelling redness stiffness
description: A form of arthritis caused by uric acid crystal deposits in the joints.
treatment: Pain relievers, anti-inflammatory drugs, lifestyle changes.
prevention: Avoid high-purine foods, stay hydrated, maintain a healthy weight.

all_symptoms: severe diarrhea dehydration vomiting leg cramps
description: An acute diarrheal disease caused by ingestion of contaminated water or food.
treatment: Rehydration therapy, antibiotics in severe cases.
prevention: Drink clean water, practice good hygiene, vaccination.

all_symptoms: weight loss fever fatigue recurrent infections
description: A viral infection that attacks the immune system.
prevention: Safe sex practices, avoid sharing needles, use pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP).

all_symptoms: itchy rash fever fatigue loss of appetite
description: A contagious viral infection causing an itchy rash and flu-like symptoms.
prevention: Vaccination.

all_symptoms: painful rash blisters itching tingling sensation
description: A reactivation of the chickenpox virus, causing a painful rash.
prevention: Vaccination, avoiding stress.

all_symptoms: muscle weakness paralysis fever fatigue
description: A viral infection that can cause paralysis.
prevention: Polio vaccination.

all_symptoms: fever cough runny nose rash
description: A highly contagious viral infection causing fever and a red rash.
prevention: Measles vaccination.

all_symptoms: fever headache difficulty swallowing paralysis
description: A viral infection transmitted through animal bites, affecting the nervous system.
prevention: Vaccinate pets, avoid contact with stray animals.

all_symptoms: muscle stiffness jaw locking difficulty swallowing seizures
description: A bacterial infection causing painful muscle stiffness.
prevention: Tetanus vaccination, proper wound care.

all_symptoms: severe cough runny nose fever vomiting after coughing
description: A highly contagious respiratory disease characterized by uncontrollable coughing.
prevention: Vaccination.

all_symptoms: fatigue sore throat swollen lymph nodes fever
description: A viral infection often caused by the Epstein-Barr virus.
prevention: Avoid sharing drinks or utensils with infected individuals.

all_symptoms: bulge in the abdomen pain while lifting discomfort nausea
description: A condition where an organ pushes through an opening in the muscle or tissue.
prevention: Avoid heavy lifting, maintain a healthy weight.

all_symptoms: abdominal pain nausea vomiting fever
description: Inflammation of the pancreas.
prevention: Avoid alcohol, maintain a healthy diet.

all_symptoms: painful swelling near the anus bleeding during bowel movements itching discomfort
description: Swollen veins in the rectum or anus causing discomfort.
treatment: Topical treatments, lifestyle changes, surgery in severe cases.
prevention: High-fiber diet, avoid straining during bowel movements.

all_symptoms: dizziness nausea loss of balance spinning sensation
description: A sensation of spinning or dizziness.
prevention: Avoid sudden head movements, manage stress.

all_symptoms: nasal congestion facial pain headache cough
description: Inflammation of the sinuses causing nasal congestion.
prevention: Manage allergies, avoid upper respiratory infections.

all_symptoms: blurred vision sensitivity to light difficulty seeing at night fading colors
description: A clouding of the eye's lens causing vision problems.
prevention: Wear sunglasses, maintain a healthy diet rich in antioxidants.
